attributes.action: Enable the public (especially girls and women) to carry a form of self defence
attributes.background: I should like innocent people to be able to defend themselves against people who wish to do them harm by using knives e.g. These sort of crimes seem to be on the increase and some people are defenceless against them. A change in the law would be required.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action:

"Make it legal to carry regulated non-lethal self-defence products"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743664

"Legalise pepper spray in England"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742673
